text: Destination Fear is an American paranormal television series that premiered on October 26, 2019 in the United States on the Travel Channel.https://www.imdb.com/title/tt11012086/ The series was renewed for a second season which premiered on April 29, 2020. New episodes will return on October 24, 2020 at 10/9c on Travel Channel. ==Summary== The program features paranormal investigator and documentary filmmaker Dakota Laden and his team of paranormal enthusiasts, including sister Chelsea Laden and friends Tanner Wiseman and Alex Schroeder. The team takes to the road in an RV, visiting a number of reportedly haunted and paranormal hotspots across the Unites States. The cast takes a new approach to the paranormal with participants sleeping solo overnight at each haunted location and recording their experiences. The show sets out to portray real-life events and the psychological impacts these paranormal hauntings have on each member of the team. ==Cast and crew== *Dakota Laden *Chelsea Laden *Tanner Wiseman *Alex Schroeder ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2019)=== ===Season 2 (2020)=== ==See also== *Ghost hunting *Paranormal television *Haunted locations in the United States ==References== ==External links== * Category:2010s American reality television series Category:2019 American television series debuts Category:Paranormal reality television series Category:Travel Channel original programming
title: Destination Fear (2019 TV series)
